tool_description: Zloadr Professional API endpoints for cryptocurrency exchanges. This category currently includes 7 endpoints:
name: Cryptocurrency Exchanges
title: Cryptocurrency Exchanges

api_list.name: Get metadata
api_list.description: Returns all static metadata for one or more exchanges including name, id, slug,logo and its various registered URLs.  pass one or more comma-separated exchanges names  Example: "Binance,okex".
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://zloadr-exchange-v1.p.rapidapi.com/RapidAPI/exchange/info?name=Binance"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zloadr-exchange-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: List all market pairs (latest)
api_list.description: Returns a list of active market pairs for one or more exchanges including name, id, slug, and its various registered URLs.   pass one or more comma-separated exchanges names Example: "Binance,okex"
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://zloadr-exchange-v1.p.rapidapi.com/RapidAPI/exchange/market-pairs_latest/?name=Binance"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zloadr-exchange-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get market quotes (historical)
api_list.description: Returns an interval of historic quotes for any exchange based on time and interval parameters. for one or more exchanges including name,slug, and its various registered URLs.      pass one or more comma-separated exchanges names Example: "Binance,okex"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zloadr-exchange-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: List all exchanges (latest)
api_list.description: Returns all cryptocurrency exchanges with 24 hour volume for one or more exchanges including name, id, slug, and its various registered URLs.    pass one or more comma-separated exchanges names Example: "Binance,okex"

api_list.name: List all exchanges (historical)

api_list.name: ID map
api_list.description: Returns a paginated list of all cryptocurrency exchanges for one or more exchanges including name,slug, and its various registered URLs.  pass one or more comma-separated exchanges names Example: "Binance,okex".
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://zloadr-exchange-v1.p.rapidapi.com/RapidAPI/exchange/map?name=Binance,okex"

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "zloadr-exchange-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
